long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your online security with Strong Password Generator & Copier, the ultimate Chrome extension for creating and managing robust passwords.

## Key Features:

• 🔒 Generate strong, unique passwords with a single click
• ⚙️ Customize password length and complexity
• 🔠 Include uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters
• 📋 Instantly copy generated passwords to your clipboard
• 📑 Create multiple password options simultaneously
• 🚫 No registration or account required

Protect your online accounts effortlessly. Whether you're signing up for a new service or updating existing passwords, our extension provides the tools you need to stay secure.

## Perfect for:

• 🏠 Personal and professional use
• 💼 IT professionals managing multiple accounts
• 🌐 Anyone concerned about online security

Simple to use, powerful in practice. Download Strong Password Generator & Copier now and take control of your digital security.

Your privacy matters: All passwords are generated locally. We never store or transmit your data.

Upgrade your password security today with Strong Password Generator & Copier!

## Permissions Explanation:

- **Storage**: This permission is used to save your settings and preferences locally, ensuring a seamless user experience.
